languages.text: "Хочешь умереть героем? Друкари схватят тебя и сломают, а умрешь ты, вылизывая им ноги".
"Do you wish to die a hero? The Drukhari will catch you and break you, and you will die licking their feet."
languages.original_text: "Хочешь умереть героем? Друкари схватят тебя и сломают, а умрешь ты, вылизывая им ноги".

traits.locale_text: "Do you wish to die a hero? The Drukhari will catch you and break you, and you will die licking their feet."
"Do you wish to die a hero? The Drukhari will catch you and break you, and you will die licking their feet."
"Do you wish to die a hero? The Drukhari will catch you and break you, and you will die licking their feet."
"Do you wish to die a hero? The Drukhari will catch you and break you, and you will die licking their feet."
"Do you wish to die a hero? The Drukhari will catch you and break you, and you will die licking their feet."

languages.text: 「英雄として死にたいのか？デュカーリは君を捕らえて打ち砕く。奴らの足をなめて死ぬことになるぞ」
languages.original_text: "Do you wish to die a hero? The Drukhari will catch you and break you, and you will die licking their feet."

traits.locale_text: 「英雄として死にたいのか？デュカーリは君を捕らえて打ち砕く。奴らの足をなめて死ぬことになるぞ」

languages.text: "Möchtet Ihr als Held sterben? Die Drukhari werden Euch ergreifen und zerbrechen, und Ihr werdet ihnen noch im Tod die Füße lecken."
languages.original_text: "Do you wish to die a hero? The Drukhari will catch you and break you, and you will die licking their feet."

traits.locale_text: "Möchtet Ihr als Held sterben? Die Drukhari werden Euch ergreifen und zerbrechen, und Ihr werdet ihnen noch im Tod die Füße lecken."

languages.text: « Vous voulez mourir en héros ? Sachez que les Drukharis vont vous briser, et vous mourrez après leur avoir léché les bottes. »
languages.original_text: "Do you wish to die a hero? The Drukhari will catch you and break you, and you will die licking their feet."

traits.locale_text: « Vous voulez mourir en héros ? Sachez que les Drukharis vont vous briser, et vous mourrez après leur avoir léché les bottes. »

languages.text: «¿Quiere morir como un héroe? Los Drukhari le atraparán y lo someterán, y entonces morirá besándoles los pies».
languages.original_text: "Do you wish to die a hero? The Drukhari will catch you and break you, and you will die licking their feet."

traits.locale_text: «¿Quiere morir como un héroe? Los Drukhari le atraparán y lo someterán, y entonces morirá besándoles los pies».

languages.text: “你想死得像个英雄一样？可那些黑暗灵族会抓住你，摧垮你的精神，你只会舔着他们的脚，一命呜呼。”
languages.original_text: "Do you wish to die a hero? The Drukhari will catch you and break you, and you will die licking their feet."

traits.locale_text: “你想死得像个英雄一样？可那些黑暗灵族会抓住你，摧垮你的精神，你只会舔着他们的脚，一命呜呼。”

languages.text: "Kahraman olarak mı ölmek istiyorsun? Drukhariler seni ele geçirecek, yalvarır hâlde can vereceksin."
languages.original_text: "Do you wish to die a hero? The Drukhari will catch you and break you, and you will die licking their feet."

traits.locale_text: "Bir kahraman olarak mı ölmek istiyorsun? Drukhari seni ele geçirecek ve bir bakmışsın yalvarırken can vermişsin."
